extendedInfo.description: Video Poker is a simulated casino poker game. A player's goal is to obtain a poker hand from 5 randomly displayed cards. This game requires two deals to be considered a WIN. Credits are given on a WIN as per pay table. A player can hold the favorable cards of the first deal to make the strategy to win the game; cards can be held by selecting the card image or lock buttons.Features* Great payouts* Multiple themes (3 themes to select in the Settings screen)* Multiple card designs* Automatic rank improved notifications* Sound effects* Nice animation graphics* MINI BONUS Games- Blackjack- Scratch cards- Roulette- Gold Run- Red or Black* Tips and tricks feature â You can use this feature to share your gaming tips with other players.* Surprise GIFTS, gifts are given in every 3 hour, get more credits through gifts.* COIN Store feature â You can transfer your credits in a coin store and use them in other Tidda games and show your achievement in the millionaire list. The coin store can be invoked by pressing COIN in the main screen.* To submit score on score leaderboard, press STAR in game screen and Leaderboard in menu screen.* The game has a score backup and restore feature. You can restore previous accumulated credits when you change handset or re-install a game.* CHALLENGES feature - You can play challenge games of 50, 100, 200 spins, submit your score and challenge other players to beat the score. Challenge individual players on a 1 to 1 challenge.*SUPPORT*For suggestions, feature request, score restore etc you can reach us at support@tiddagames.comsearch keywords -Poker video poker roulette casino blackjack heyzap social facebook twiter score leaderboard richest millionaire poker slot challenges bonus games blackjack video poker scratch card gold run roulette slot machine card slot poker slot
